duties_responsibilities.duty: Serve as a trusted sounding board for the CRO, providing a platform to discuss strategic business decisions across Sales, Client Strategy, and Partnerships teams.
Brainstorm multiple approaches and solutions to complex strategic initiatives while assessing cross-functional impact and ensuring agility.
Analyze, research, execute, and track projects of varying scales to propel the growth of the revenue organization.
Drive operational improvements on day-to-day processes within the business and the leadership team.
Manage executive meeting agendas, offsites, and programs in partnership with the CRO’s executive assistant.
Take a first pass at analyzing important documents and decisions that come across the CRO’s desk.

education_certification.credential: BA/BS degree, 4+ years of experience in management consulting or investment banking, and technology start-ups. Mastery of Google Suite, primarily Sheets and Slides.
